column4: hey folks, guess how many times i've installed ubuntu in the past two days
: sounds like ssh when a host key changes
: if it's ssh, the rest of the message tells you exactly what to do
: anyone can make a repo, so yes
: what else have you tried? do you mean 'the web is broken'
I can see you from here ok (in washington yeah?)
: how are you connecting? through uni?
: look mate,your dns is broken. you need a valid nameserver to put in /etc/resolv.conf, and we can't tell you one. you need your network admin or isp
dbernar1 : odd that xchat uses an IP though?
a mount maps a disk or devices filesystem in the toplevel filesystem
